005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013public interface IHostnameItem extends IStringItem {
014  /**
015   * Construct a new host name item using the provided string {@code value}.
016   *
017   * @param value
018   *          a string representing an host name value
019   * @return the new item
020   */
021  @NonNull
022  static IHostnameItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
023    try {
024      return new HostnameItemImpl(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.HOSTNAME.parse(value));
025    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
026      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(String.format("Unable to parse string value '%s'", value),
027          ex);
028    }
029  }
030
031  /**
032   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
033   *
034   * @param item
035   *          the item to cast
036   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
037   *         cast to this type
038   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
039   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
040   */
041  @NonNull
042  static IHostnameItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
043    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.HOSTNAME.cast(item);
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  default IHostnameItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
048    return cast(item);
049  }
050}
